title: Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for "R. Buckminster Fuller, Maker of Contemporary Architecture" by John McHale and George Braziller", 1962
medium: Lithography in red and black ink on off-white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover across the top in black and red ink: BY JOHN MCHALE [black] R. BUCKMINSTER FULLER [red]/ MAKERS OF CONTEMPORARY ARCHITECTURE
Down the center spine vertically in red and black ink: R. Buckminster Fuller [red] BY JOHN MCHALE George Braziller [black]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Both covers have a series of diagonal interconnecccted black lines against a white background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for "R. Buckminster Fuller, Maker of Contemporary Architecture" by John McHale and George Braziller", 1962.
1962. Lithography in red and black ink on off-white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-51.
